title: Music Near Me
content: A mobile app that will send you notifications whenever a concert is playing in your area.

title: A Portfolio
content: A portfolio is necessary to a successful job search.  Read here to learn how to make your portfolio shine.

title: Sip; A Review
content: A simple cocktail recipe finder. Simply choose the spirit you have on hand and Sip will show you pictures of many cocktails that can be made using it.
